name: Havenly, Inc.
description: Provider of interior designing services intended to offer a guide to decorating homes. The company offers a platform that assists to select a designer, personalizing the design, collaborating on ideas, visualizing the room, chatting with a professional for further advice, and making the purchase, enabling people to have a cost-effective way to redesign their homes.
one_liner: Provider of interior designing services intended to offer a guide to decorating homes. The company offers a platform that assists to select a designer, personalizing the design, collaborating on ideas, visualizing the room, chatting with a professional for further advice, and making the purchase, enabling people to have a cost-effective way to redesign their homes.
